00001 /**
00002  * \file GeodesicProj.cpp
00003  * \brief Command line utility for geodesic projections
00004  *
00005  * Copyright (c) Charles Karney (2009, 2010, 2011) <charles@karney.com>
00006  * and licensed under the MIT/X11 License.  For more information, see
00007  * http://geographiclib.sourceforge.net/
00008  *
00009  * Compile and link with
00010  *   g++ -g -O3 -I../include -I../man -o GeodesicProj \
00011  *       GeodesicProj.cpp \
00012  *       ../src/AzimuthalEquidistant.cpp \
00013  *       ../src/CassiniSoldner.cpp \
00014  *       ../src/DMS.cpp \
00015  *       ../src/Geodesic.cpp \
00016  *       ../src/GeodesicLine.cpp \
00017  *       ../src/Gnomonic.cpp
00018  *
00019  * See the <a href="GeodesicProj.1.html">man page</a> for usage
00020  * information.
00021  **********************************************************************/
00022 
00023 #include <iostream>
00024 #include <sstream>
00025 #include <string>
00026 #include <sstream>
00027 #include <fstream>
00028 #include <GeographicLib/Geodesic.hpp>
00029 #include <GeographicLib/AzimuthalEquidistant.hpp>
00030 #include <GeographicLib/CassiniSoldner.hpp>
00031 #include <GeographicLib/Gnomonic.hpp>
00032 #include <GeographicLib/DMS.hpp>
00033 #include <GeographicLib/Utility.hpp>
00034 
00035 #include "GeodesicProj.usage"
00036 
00037 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
00038   try {
00039     using namespace GeographicLib;
00040     typedef Math::real real;
00041     bool azimuthal = false, cassini = false, gnomonic = false, reverse = false;
00042     real lat0 = 0, lon0 = 0;
00043     real
00044       a = Constants::WGS84_a<real>(),
00045       f = Constants::WGS84_f<real>();
00046     std::string istring, ifile, ofile;
00047 
00048     for (int m = 1; m < argc; ++m) {
00049       std::string arg(argv[m]);
00050       if (arg == "-r")
00051         reverse = true;
00052       else if (arg == "-c" || arg == "-z" || arg == "-g") {
00053         cassini = arg == "-c";
00054         azimuthal = arg == "-z";
00055         gnomonic = arg == "-g";
00056         if (m + 2 >= argc) return usage(1, true);
00057         try {
00058           DMS::DecodeLatLon(std::string(argv[m + 1]), std::string(argv[m + 2]),
00059                             lat0, lon0);
00060         }
00061         catch (const std::exception& e) {
00062           std::cerr << "Error decoding arguments of " << arg << ": "
00063                     << e.what() << "\n";
00064           return 1;
00065         }
00066         m += 2;
00067       } else if (arg == "-e") {
00068         if (m + 2 >= argc) return usage(1, true);
00069         try {
00070           a = Utility::num<real>(std::string(argv[m + 1]));
00071           f = Utility::fract<real>(std::string(argv[m + 2]));
00072         }
00073         catch (const std::exception& e) {
00074           std::cerr << "Error decoding arguments of -e: " << e.what() << "\n";
00075           return 1;
00076         }
00077         m += 2;
00078       } else if (arg == "--input-string") {
00079         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00080         istring = argv[m];
00081       } else if (arg == "--input-file") {
00082         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00083         ifile = argv[m];
00084       } else if (arg == "--output-file") {
00085         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00086         ofile = argv[m];
00087       } else if (arg == "--version") {
00088         std::cout
00089           << argv[0]
00090           << ": $Id: add83c03428521dde4441cc0de01d5b8313549b6 $\n"
00091           << "GeographicLib version " << GEOGRAPHICLIB_VERSION_STRING << "\n";
00092         return 0;
00093       } else
00094         return usage(!(arg == "-h" || arg == "--help"), arg != "--help");
00095     }
00096 
00097     if (!ifile.empty() && !istring.empty()) {
00098       std::cerr << "Cannot specify --input-string and --input-file together\n";
00099       return 1;
00100     }
00101     if (ifile == "-") ifile.clear();
00102     std::ifstream infile;
00103     std::istringstream instring;
00104     if (!ifile.empty()) {
00105       infile.open(ifile.c_str());
00106       if (!infile.is_open()) {
00107         std::cerr << "Cannot open " << ifile << " for reading\n";
00108         return 1;
00109       }
00110     } else if (!istring.empty()) {
00111       std::string::size_type m = 0;
00112       while (true) {
00113         m = istring.find(';', m);
00114         if (m == std::string::npos)
00115           break;
00116         istring[m] = '\n';
00117       }
00118       instring.str(istring);
00119     }
00120     std::istream* input = !ifile.empty() ? &infile :
00121       (!istring.empty() ? &instring : &std::cin);
00122 
00123     std::ofstream outfile;
00124     if (ofile == "-") ofile.clear();
00125     if (!ofile.empty()) {
00126       outfile.open(ofile.c_str());
00127       if (!outfile.is_open()) {
00128         std::cerr << "Cannot open " << ofile << " for writing\n";
00129         return 1;
00130       }
00131     }
00132     std::ostream* output = !ofile.empty() ? &outfile : &std::cout;
00133 
00134     if (!(azimuthal || cassini || gnomonic)) {
00135       std::cerr << "Must specify \"-z lat0 lon0\" or "
00136                 << "\"-c lat0 lon0\" or \"-g lat0 lon0\"\n";
00137       return 1;
00138     }
00139 
00140     const Geodesic geod(a, f);
00141     const CassiniSoldner cs = cassini ?
00142       CassiniSoldner(lat0, lon0, geod) : CassiniSoldner(geod);
00143     const AzimuthalEquidistant az(geod);
00144     const Gnomonic gn(geod);
00145 
00146     std::string s;
00147     int retval = 0;
00148     std::cout << std::fixed;
00149     while (std::getline(*input, s)) {
00150       try {
00151         std::istringstream str(s);
00152         real lat, lon, x, y, azi, rk;
00153         std::string stra, strb;
00154         if (!(str >> stra >> strb))
00155           throw GeographicErr("Incomplete input: " + s);
00156         if (reverse) {
00157           x = Utility::num<real>(stra);
00158           y = Utility::num<real>(strb);
00159         } else
00160           DMS::DecodeLatLon(stra, strb, lat, lon);
00161         std::string strc;
00162         if (str >> strc)
00163           throw GeographicErr("Extraneous input: " + strc);
00164         if (reverse) {
00165           if (cassini)
00166             cs.Reverse(x, y, lat, lon, azi, rk);
00167           else if (azimuthal)
00168             az.Reverse(lat0, lon0, x, y, lat, lon, azi, rk);
00169           else
00170             gn.Reverse(lat0, lon0, x, y, lat, lon, azi, rk);
00171           *output << Utility::str<real>(lat, 15) << " "
00172                   << Utility::str<real>(lon, 15) << " "
00173                   << Utility::str<real>(azi, 15) << " "
00174                   << Utility::str<real>(rk, 16) << "\n";
00175         } else {
00176           if (cassini)
00177             cs.Forward(lat, lon, x, y, azi, rk);
00178           else if (azimuthal)
00179             az.Forward(lat0, lon0, lat, lon, x, y, azi, rk);
00180           else
00181             gn.Forward(lat0, lon0, lat, lon, x, y, azi, rk);
00182           *output << Utility::str<real>(x, 10) << " "
00183                   << Utility::str<real>(y, 10) << " "
00184                   << Utility::str<real>(azi, 15) << " "
00185                   << Utility::str<real>(rk, 16) << "\n";
00186         }
00187       }
00188       catch (const std::exception& e) {
00189         *output << "ERROR: " << e.what() << "\n";
00190         retval = 1;
00191       }
00192     }
00193     return retval;
00194   }
00195   catch (const std::exception& e) {
00196     std::cerr << "Caught exception: " << e.what() << "\n";
00197     return 1;
00198   }
00199   catch (...) {
00200     std::cerr << "Caught unknown exception\n";
00201     return 1;
00202   }
00203 }
